comments:
When using a newer workbench against an older AC on HP-UX, Probekit sometimes gets confused in its classloading order and produces this error message:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/StringBuilder
	at myprobe_probe$Probe_0._entry(myprobe_probe.java:13)
	at StartStop.main(StartStop.java)

This exception is caused because the probe class is loaded prior to java.lang.StringBuffer.  This could be a configuration issue on the HP-UX box.  

This problem is only happening on HP-UX
Started working once AC was restarted.
Updated target to match the iteration when this defect was processed
